title: 1888 NY Giants Albumen Image - Price Reduced
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1888 NY Giants Albumen Image - Price Reduced
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
Most likely a one-of-a-kind image of Manager Mutrie and some of his 1888 NY Giants players.  This is an 8x10 albumen (image portion is 6x8½). $950   

Note - Just in case there is any confusion, CDV's and cabinet cards are also albumen images.  They (CDV's and cabinet cards) obtained their names because of their mass-produced, standard sizes.  This image is being called by its basic albumen name because it is larger than a cabinet card and the mount is not typical of an imperial cabinet card (an over-sized cabinet card), although one might call it that.  It is, however, very much a period image.  This type of image was not what one would expect of a mass-produced image and was probably made available only to one, or a few, of the players in the image.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1232126369.JPG[/IMG] 

Stereoview of some soldiers in baseball poses.  Back of the image has old pencil inscription "Encampment at Water Gap". $Sold

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1232132171.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1232132184.JPG[/IMG] 

A neat view of the stereoview can be seen here (thanks Jimmy L.):

[IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/8958/stereoanimtest2dz1.gif[/IMG]

Thanks,

Rob M.
